name: 100 (itch)
description:
This game was made by three friends and I as part of our studies, it took us two months and we hope some of you might enjoy it !

100 is a "dodge'em up", so imagine a shoot'em up in which you can't shoot.
But don't worry, there are enough bullets to keep you busy !

The game can be difficult and very few have ever beaten the hard mode, don't hesitate to brag about it if you do !

You can also play with a friend if you think it will make things easier, just try not to get your partner killed, okay ?
